attributes.review: let me start off by saying this app took a week to download. when it was finally done downloading, it immediately started glitching which led to me having to take my phone to get fixed. i then received e mails telling me that this app had all rights over me and they had control over all of my personal information; threatening to release it to this world if i said anything to anyone. such as my address, social security, etc. i started receiving death threats, and every note had “-the trump application.” i kept receiving e mails and even texts stating that no one would believe me if i ever came clean about these threats. i texted the number back saying “you don’t have control over me, i’m coming forward about this app.” the next day, my dog toby was found dead with “t app” on his stomach; along with a note saying “stay silent or next time it won’t be the dog.” written in toby’s blood. i am extremely horrified with the actions of trump and his app. ❤️
attributes.title: #savetiktok2020

attributes.review: this is a HORRIBLE app when I downloaded it it started blasting heavy metal music and it wouldn’t stop. after uninstalling it and downloading it again this giant cheeto came out of my phone and started yelling horrible things at me and started telling me to drink bleach to keep me from getting sick!! after I told him to leave he went downstairs and jumped on top of my sister causing to break all of her bones because of his weight, she is now paralyzed😕 after that he ate all the food in my house and then I told him if I didn’t get out id do something and he took my phone and called these pigs that came and arrested me for threatening the president.😪😪
attributes.title: help.

attributes.review:
terrible app!! 😡 it took 26 DAYS to download 🙄💆🏻‍♀️✨ and my phone wouldnt work at ALL during the downloading process👉🏻👈🏻 AND i couldnt even stop the download!! and FINALLY when it downloaded 🤪🤩 it started playing music 🎶😏 that attracted FLYING SPIDERS 🕷😟 then the FLYING SPIDERS 🕷😩 E X P L O D E D 💥☄️ and set my house on FIRE 🔥 after i figured out how to turn off the music 🎼😌 our beloved cheeto KING showed up at my house and told me he was gonna make america gReAt AgAiN😎😍 i REALLY wanted to delete the app 🥰💆🏻‍♀️but the good republican conservative christian in me knew to not delete the app 🥰🤮 i knew that our cheeto KING needs M E in his BeAuTiFuL army 🐸🦋 anyways do N O T recommend the app 😍✨👉🏻👈🏻

(i am now homeless)
attributes.title: oompa loompa army

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the hype was about , but when I opened it , it let off a terrible terrible Oder , let’s say it smelt like very old moldy oranges mixed with old stiff blonde wig .🙈 it took weeks to download which was very disappointing 😔 when I also opened the racist app you will never believe what I saw with my eyes 😖 I seen this huge orange monster and it said “keep America great again” I would not recommend to kids it will give you nightmares 😔 , as I was reading the reviews I noticed a lot of Karen’s trying to put in there 2 cents which is not needed anyways , this app is horrible and smelt very bad ! Toodles !😁
attributes.title: Giving me .... cracker vibes .🙈😍

attributes.review: The app took hours to download but I have good wifi, when i opened the app it was extremely laggy and it glitched a lot, I uninstalled and reinstalled to make sure it wasn’t just a phone issue and it the same thing happened, horrible app, should never get, some strange orange man with small hands kept popping up and the president was nowhere on this app, the app kept closing and wouldn’t stay open for even a minute, I don’t get why this guy is getting all the boomer conservative hype, BLM ACAB, hope this review helped, hopefully this trash of an app gets taken down soon but hopefully the trash of a president gets taken down sooner
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: So apparently this app would help me learn about or current president and I was interested and hoped to lean more about him from this app but it wasn’t helpful. As soon as I opened the app , medical services called me and told me that I had the symptoms of COVID-19. They said if I don’t get it checked out that they would send the US Army troops to come and raid my house from an official Donald Trump order. I felt my life being threatened and at risk. I didn’t get checked out and 1 week later, SWAT came to my house and shot my window 😔the bullet struck my cats back and left it paralyzed 🤧 I don’t recommend you to get this app, IT PUTS YOUR LIFE ON THE LINE !
attributes.title: I got the coronavirus from this app 😪

attributes.review: I just wanted to support my orange 🍊 president by downloading this app but it took way to long to actually download and when I finally got it installed it kicked me out 😠 like huh? I was devastated 😞 so I tried again in hopes that I could get on the app and it finally worked 😌 I was so happy until I saw that it started glitching 😣 all of a sudden the screen started flashing orange and black😤 and I get dizzy when I see bright colors so it gave me a really big headache 🤕my head was hurting sooo baddd and I never expected an APP to cause me physical pain😭😢 So I would recommend you delete it, it might make you cry too ☹️ so hide ya kids and hide ya wife
attributes.title: It made me cry 😞

I almost DIED by this app. I got a terrible sickness from it that left me paralyzed from the toes down and trumps secret orange ninjas broke into my house and robbed me! Now I'm homeless with no money or food. My time will end soon and it's ALL THIS APP'S FAULT! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 DO NOT DOWNLOAD YOU WILL HAVE EXPLOSIVE DIARRHEA!! and sometimes, you can't hold it in so it just pours out like Niagara Falls. IM TELLING YOU! DONT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE AS ME 💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩👹👹👹👹👺👺👹👺☠️☠️🤢💀🤢🤢👹👻👹🤢🤡👺🤮🤮🤮🤮😪🤠🤤😵👺🤑🤮🤑👺🤮🤕🤮

attributes.review: He needs to learn what to do, instead of being president he is actually making people divide. America shouldn’t be that way, we need people to come together. He should be thinking of the lives he as tortured. This is disgusting and you guys should have never voted for trump, all of the trump supporters are blind! All they see are the “good” things he has done (there is no good things) but in reality he is a pain in the back. attributes.title: He will never bring justice, this is trash.

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to help my black family finally understand why the orange god🍊 is so amazing but I WAS WRONG. THIS APP MADE MY PHONE EXPLODE ORANGE JUICE!! (i’m on my son’s phone). not only did this app make my phone explode but it showed me a picture of trump holding a shrimp 🦐?? my daughter just laughed but i didn’t get it🤷🏽‍♀️. also people came and raided my house holding up trump 2020 signs and flags and took my dog! i miss him so much 😭. but now my house is basically just a bunch of sticks holding up the ceiling and we’re extremely poor. so this app ✨ACTUALLY RUINED MY LIFE✨. but it’s probably just gen z pranking us AGAIN 😂. i’ll update you when we get my dog back :)
attributes.title: bunker boy, i’m disappointed😔
